txt.en: Gyric is in Forlaw.\n\nYou should return to Gyric with news of your success.
Whitshaws: Mounted-fishing
'You have done well, [placeholder]...a perfect score in so short a time. You should return to Gyric now with my recommendation.'
Caught a Fish ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'In the wake of Núrzum's rampage, my folk need the aid of skilled defenders to prevent such a tragedy from occurring again. I have devised trials to prove the worthiness of those who would come to our aid.

'As you have no doubt learned, my people pride themselves on their horsemanship and mounted combat skills. If you truly wish to aid us further, test your skills by netting fish on the ice near the lake. We must ensure that this trial is capable of challenging a variety of participants, and I will even see to rewarding you if succeed. 

'Fish stranded on the ice can be captured in our nets by a person of suitable skill. We will provide you with small, medium, and large nets to be used from horseback. Catch as many fish as you can; success in this trial depends in the haul.

'Speak with me again when you are ready to begin, and may fortune betide you.'

<rgb=#FF0000>This quest requires Mounted Combat</rgb>

<rgb=#00FF00>This is a timed quest. You must capture 30 fish in nets before time runs out.</rgb>
Points scored: ([placeholder])
Talk to Gyric in Forlaw
<rgb=#FF0000>Time has expired</rgb>
'You are ready to travel then? Good.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow time to expire</rgb>
Used fishing-spear
'Speak with Rilbert when you arrive in the Whitshaws. He will provide you with whatever you need to begin your trial.'

'So, Gyric sent you to be tested? Very well. Take these nets. You will have five minutes to gather up the fish which litter the shores of the lake amid the pools.

'You will find that you must employ careful navigation as well as choosing the best net for each situation to succeed. The larger nets take more time to recover and cannot be wielded as frequently, so aim them carefully! One final piece of advice: take heed of the frost grims hiding among the pools. They are known to respond with great force against riders who approach them.

'Good luck to you . . . I will begin counting your time immediately.'

<rgb=#FF0000>This quest requires Mounted Combat</rgb>

<rgb=#00FF00>Note: This quest auto-completes upon completing the trial.</rgb>
Speared large fish ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Rilbert
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Points scored: ([placeholder])
Gyric is waiting for your decision in Forlaw.\n\nYou should speak with Gyric when you are ready to travel to the Whitshaws and talk to Rilbert to begin your trial.
Used fishing-spear
Gyric is in Forlaw, awaiting your decision.\n\nYou should speak with Gyric when you are ready to travel to the Whitshaws and begin your trial.

Fish can be found on the ice of the Whitshaws, amid the pools near the lake at the heart of Wildermore.\n\nRilbert has begun to count your time. You should spear as many fish as possible before time runs out.
Use the sack of nets Rilbert gave you to obtain your skills, then begin catching fish along the course.
'Alas, your skills are not what they seemed at first. Perhaps Gyric will allow you another pass?'
'You should speak with Rilbert when you arrive in the Whitshaws.'
Talk to Gyric to travel to the Whitshaws and speak with Rilbert
Fish of varying sizes can be found throughout the ice pools in the Whitshaws.\n\nYou should spear as many fish as possible to gain points and complete your trial.
Spear large fish ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Use the fishing-spear to obtain your skills
<rgb=#FF0000>Time has expired</rgb>
'Your skills still need work, I am afraid.'

In the wake of Núrzum's rampage, the folk of Wildermore seek the aid of skilled defenders.

<rgb=#FF0000>This quest requires Mounted Combat</rgb>

<rgb=#00FF00>Note: This quest auto-completes upon beating the course.</rgb>
Talk to Gyric when you are ready to travel to the Whitshaws
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not allow time to expire</rgb>
Rilbert is south of the ice pools.\n\nYou should return to Rilbert for evaluation.
Obtained nets from the sack
Use the net sack to obtain your skills
Fish Caught: ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Well done. Return to Gyric with my compliments.'
'You should speak with Rilbert when you arrive in the Whitshaws.'
Points scored: ([placeholder])
'I have received Rilbert's report...you are a fine [placeholder] indeed!'
